subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Atlanta Thrashers sent the rights to the free-agent center Keith Tkachuk back to St. Louis yesterday and reacquired the conditional first-round pick in the N.H.L. draft that they traded to the Blues in February. To acquire Tkachuk in a trade Feb. 25, the Thrashers gave up forward Glen Metropolit, two picks in last week’s draft, and a second-round pick next year.
